abstract: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei promises that Iran will retaliate against United States should it take 'improper actions' over alleged Iranian plot to kill Saudi ambassador to United States.
snippet: Iran, responding to American efforts to isolate it in the wake of an alleged assassination plot, offered tough words from two top leaders on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Iran, responding to American efforts to isolate it in the wake of an alleged assassination plot, offered tough words from two top leaders on Sunday.

headline.main: Iran Reacts to Pressure From America
headline.print_headline: Iran Reacts To Efforts By the U.S. To Pressure It
headline.seo: Iran Warns U.S. Against Trying to Pressure It
